ygData.subject: Re: OFF TOPIC - email problems??
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noiticed this too, recently.  It was fine for a while, but now that problem is back.  I used to get my own posts back within 3 or 4 minutes of posting
ygData.messageBody:
I have noiticed this too, recently. It was fine for a while, but now that
problem is back. I used to get my own posts back within 3 or 4 minutes of
posting them, but now sometimes I wait a few days.

I hope they fix whatever is wrong.

I'm suspecting they just don't have enough horsepower for the amount of
traffic at Onelist, now.

> For those of you who receive this via email AND for whomever manages -
troubleshoots this list:
>
> Does anyone else receive responses to posts before they get the actual
original post??? This happens to me all the time, and sometimes it's days
before I get the original post and can figure out what is being discussed...
>
> Also, I've noticed that some posts of mine come back throught right away,
while others I have posted take days...
>
> Is there a technical problem someone can look into???
>
